content: I'm particularly interested in the Cinnamon Apple Waffles and the Spinach and Feta Omelette. I think they would pair really well with the Fresh Fruit Salad and the Garlic and Herb Roasted Cherry Tomatoes. Do you have any suggestions for beverages to serve with these dishes? Maybe something refreshing and fruity to cut through the richness of the waffles and omelette?
